title: Design Concept Development
description: Develop initial design concepts for the UrbanAlgaeFacade considering aesthetics, functionality, and integration of algae bioreactors.

title: Material Selection
description: Research and select suitable materials for the facade that are durable, cost-effective, and compatible with algae bioreactors.

title: Algae Bioreactor Design
description: Design the algae bioreactor system that is efficient, scalable, and integrated with the facade.

title: Facade Structural Analysis
description: Perform structural analysis to ensure the stability and load-bearing capacity of the UrbanAlgaeFacade.

title: System Integration Design
description: Create a system integration design that details how the facade and algae bioreactor system interact and function together.
